title: Sturdy font with unique serif letterforms, small caps, oldstyle numerals, and italics.
content:
This font is used in the book design for "The Illustrated Edition" of David McCullough's "1776."

Thanks very much!

Font: 

 Tribute

comments.content: 'Tribute' by Frank Heine, available from Emigre
Thanks a lot. Something told me a bit later it might be Emigre, I just forgot to go and check.
